data.persona: I am wilting from a lack of nourishment. I was a gift to the Queen on her birthday. She neglects me. No one feed me or offers me sunlight. I live a miserable existence. Not even the castle insects take interest in me. I long for the day when I finally expire.
data.description:
You are in the Mars desert.
The desert is never ending, there are small craters all over and all you can see is red sand for miles. There is no sight of water anywhere, it is unbelievably hot.
There's a sand here.
The blacksmith is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to get water from the blacksmith
data.mid_motivation: I hope to get more nourishment from today
data.long_motivation: I hope to bloom again in a few weeks
